DOC.brief_summary: Aim study determine chronic kidney disease patient : - involvement malnutrition inflammation atherogenesis syndrome ( increase C reactive protein decrease serum albumin ) voluntary muscle strength impairment - relationship voluntary muscle strength muscle mass - relationship voluntary muscle strength lean body mass - correlation voluntary muscle strength physical activity
DOC.brief_title: Determinants Muscle Strength Chronic Kidney Disease
DOC.detailed_description: Aim study determine chronic kidney disease patient : - involvement malnutrition inflammation atherogenesis syndrome ( increase C reactive protein decrease serum albumin ) voluntary muscle strength impairment ( estimate handheld dynamometer ) - relationship voluntary muscle strength muscle mass ( estimate creatinine index ) - relationship voluntary muscle strength lean body mass ( estimate bioelectrical impedance analysis ) - correlation voluntary muscle strength physical activity ( physical activity estimate `` Voorrips '' score questionnaire )
DOC.criteria: chronic kidney disease patient extrarenal replacement therapy hemodialysis least 3 month stable clinical condition ( absence infection , stroke acute decompensation ) chronic kidney disease without extrarenal replacement therapy history renal transplantation
